data.title: Enjoyment and hiking in a unique area with a great view
data.meta_description: Take the gondola from Marbach to the Marbachegg. Enjoy the beautiful view on the sunny terrace. Find action on the cart track or a sporty activity in the beautiful hiking area.
data.text:
Marbachegg at 1500 m.a.s.l. - the sun terrace with the most beautiful panorama, where the Emmental and Entlebuch meet. The panorama gondola takes you from Marbach LU to Marbachegg in just 10 minutes. Here a breathtaking view awaits you with views of the imposing Schrattenfluh, the striking Hohgant and the Bernese Alps. In the rustic and cozy mountain inn Marbachegg you will be spoiled with culinary delights. A variety of activities await you on and around the Marbachegg; explore the surroundings and let yourself be surprised!

Sporting activities:

Bike enthusiasts should definitely try the Clientis Flowtrail or the CKW Jumptrail. The area also knows how to attract attention with interesting bike tours. For high-flyers, Marbachegg is a paragliding El Dorado. Also carting on the wooden track inspires various age groups.
